meshIneBits

Class Bit2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • meshIneBits.Bit2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Bit2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Bit2D represent a bit in 2D : boundaries and cut path. A Bit3D is build with multiple Bit2D
    See Also:
    Bit3D

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bit2D

        public Bit2D(Bit2D modelBit,
             double percentageLength,
             double percentageWidth)
        Constructor to clone an existing bit into a smaller one. All the other parameters remain unchanged in comparison to model bit.
        Parameters:
        modelBit - the model
        percentageLength - from 0 to 100
        percentageWidth - from 0 to 100

      • Bit2D

        public Bit2D(Vector2 origin,
             Vector2 orientation)
        A new full bit with originBit and orientation in the coordinate system of the associated pattern
        Parameters:
        origin - the center of bit's outer bound
        orientation - the rotation of bit

      • Bit2D

        public Bit2D(Vector2 origin,
             Vector2 orientation,
             double length,
             double width)
        Constructor for custom length and width.
        Parameters:
        origin - the center of bit's outer bound
        orientation - the rotation of bit
        length - length of the bit
        width - width of the bit

      • Bit2D

        public Bit2D(Vector2 origin,
             Vector2 orientation,
             double length,
             double width,
             java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transfoMatrix,
             java.awt.geom.AffineTransform inverseTransfoMatrix,
             java.util.Vector<java.awt.geom.Path2D> cutPaths,
             java.util.Vector<java.awt.geom.Area> areas)
        Constructor for cloning
        Parameters:
        origin - center of bit's outer bound
        orientation - rotation of the bit
        length - length of the bit
        width - width of the bit
        transfoMatrix - transformation to be applied
        inverseTransfoMatrix - inversion of transfoMatrix
        cutPaths - where to cut this bit
        areas - set of non intersected areas

        public java.util.Vector<Vector2> computeLiftPoints()
        Returns:
        a set of lift points, each of which is in charge of each separated area (in case a bit has many separated areas)

      • resize

        public void resize(double newPercentageLength,
                   double newPercentageWidth)
        To resize a bit, keeping up-right corner as reference.
        Parameters:
        newPercentageLength - 100 means retain 100% of old bit's length
        newPercentageWidth - 100 means retain 100% of old bit's width

      • createTransformedBit

        public Bit2D createTransformedBit(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transformation)
        This method only accepts the conservative transformation (no scaling). The coordinates are rounded by CraftConfig.errorAccepted to accelerate calculation.
        Parameters:
        transformation - a combination of affine transformation
        Returns:
        a new bit with same geometric with initial one transformed by transfoMatrix
